name: 4ga-boards
tagline: A self-hosted Kanban-style task management app for real-time collaboration and team workflows
description: 4gaBoards is an open-source, self-hostable Kanban-style task-management web app designed for real-time collaboration. It features dark mode, intuitive drag-&-drop boards with multi-level hierarchy (projects → boards → lists → cards → tasks), advanced Markdown editing, import/export support (including from Trello), and simplified wide-screen UI with minimal clutter. Built with React/Redux on the front end and Sails.js/Knex/PostgreSQL on the back end, 4gaBoards is published under the MIT License and supports Docker / Kubernetes deployment.

features.title: Imageboard Engine
features.description: Provides a web-based imageboard system for posting threads and replies with media attachments

features.title: Anonymous Posting
features.description: Allows users to create posts without requiring user accounts or personal identification

features.title: Threaded Discussions
features.description: Organizes posts into threads with replies displayed in a hierarchical or chronological structure

features.title: Media Upload Support
features.description: Supports attaching images and other media files to posts within threads

features.title: Board Management
features.description: Enables creation and configuration of multiple boards with separate topics or rules

features.title: Moderation Tools
features.description: Provides basic controls for removing posts, threads, or inappropriate content

features.title: Lightweight Deployment
features.description: Designed to run with minimal dependencies and simple server-side setup
